<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:e15c1bd98379e610fa7e7230feaad392</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>downloadChange</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	console.log("newValue:", newValue);
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   if(newValue) {
	  var sysparm_table = "alm_transfer_order_line_task";
	  var sysparm_sys_id = "4e78682b98e4221055904c91e2b654b3";
	  var link='https://dev311432.service-now.com/'; // Replace with  sys_parm to get the instace name 
	  var url = link+sysparm_table + '.do?PDF&sys_id=' + sysparm_sys_id;
	  // console.log("url: ", url);
	  g_navigation.openPopup(url);
   }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-28 09:57:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a2bc5f1d8379e610fa7e7230feaad3cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>downloadChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Test scripting" source="x_1755686_test_scr">258c414583b96610fa7e7230feaad3c7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Test scripting">258c414583b96610fa7e7230feaad3c7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a2bc5f1d8379e610fa7e7230feaad3cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-28 10:03:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
